title: There are five students P,Q, R,S and T who are sitting on a bench. T & Q are sitting together, T & R are sitting together, P is on the extreme left, Q is second from extreme right. Who is sitting between P &Q? - Quora

response.answer_text: PRTQS is the solution. TQ or QT.TR or RT.Combining 1 & 2, {RTQ} or {QRT} as a unit.P on extreme left.= P _ _ _ _ . = P R T Q _. = P R T Q S. Now you can figure.
